snippet: A so-called statement of objections that was sent to Universal spelled out concerns over the market power of the combined company.
abstract: European Commission says that the proposed purchase of EMI Music by Universal Music Group poses significant harm to competition within the recording industry, indicating that substantial concessions must be made in order for Universal to win approval.

headline.main: Europe Objects to Universal Acquisition of EMI
headline.print_headline: Europeans Are Said to Balk at Universal-EMI Music Deal

snippet: Both Windows and Mac OS X include tools for making it easier to see things on the screen.
abstract: Both Windows and Mac OS X include tools for making it easier to see things on the screen.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Magnify Your Screen

snippet: Government and Communist Party officials have been told to cut back on their purchases of high-end liquor, particularly the fiery Moutai that is served at most state banquets. Sales of luxury alcohol brands have fallen, though a brand whose name r...
abstract: Government and Communist Party officials have been told to cut back on their purchases of high-end liquor, particularly the fiery Moutai that is served at most state banquets. Sales of luxury alcohol brands have fallen, though a brand whose name relates to that of the next party boss is selling briskly.

headline.main: One Chinese Liquor Brand Is the Life of the Party

snippet: The Paly Entrepreneurs Club in Palo Alto, Calif., meets to discuss members’ ventures and ideas and to explore matters like money-raising and new markets.
abstract: Paly Entrepreneurs Club in Palo Alto, Calif, an extracurricular group at the local high school, meets to discuss members’ ventures and ideas and to explore matters like money-raising and new markets.

headline.main: Doing Apps and Start-Ups While Still in High School
headline.print_headline: Doing Apps and Start-Ups While Still in High School

snippet: Google’s proposal seeks to address European concerns that it might have abused its dominance in Internet search by promoting its own businesses at the expense of rivals.
abstract: Google sends a proposal to the European Commission seeking to address concerns that it might have abused its dominance in Internet search by promoting its own businesses at the expense of rivals; faces prospect of formal antitrust charges.

headline.main: To Avoid a Long Dispute, Google Offers to Settle a European Antitrust Case
headline.print_headline: To Avoid a Long Dispute, Google Offers to Settle a European Antitrust Case

snippet: A Chinese provincial court said the American technology company had settled a lawsuit by paying $60 million into a court-approved bank account for the legal rights to use the iPad trademark in China.

headline.main: Apple Settles iPad Trademark Dispute With Chinese Company
headline.print_headline: Apple Settles iPad Trademark Dispute With Chinese Company

abstract: Organic popcorn in unusual seasonal flavors is featured at Populence, a sophisticated popcorn store, in Greenwich Village. Photos (S)
